name: Sneak Out
description:
Sneak Out is a casual stealth-puzzle game where you control a mischievous boy to plan and execute hilarious escape scenarios to sneak out of his parents’ house to crash a party (that he probably won’t be old enough to attend 😬)!

FEATURES:
  • 10 fun and creative escape scenarios to complete
  • 16 room house full of objects and routes to escape
  • Terrorize your parents and be the most annoying kid EVER
  • You can HIDE from your parents!

  • SLAM DOORS in their faces!

  • And be the ultimate TROLL!

  • All while dealing with a little annoying dog.
